com.authlete.cbor

Class CBORItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.authlete.cbor.CBORItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CBORBreak, CBORItemList, CBORNull, CBORPairList, CBORTaggedItem, CBORUndefined, CBORValue

    public abstract class CBORItem
extends Object
    CBOR data item.

      • getComment

        public String getComment()
        Get the comment attached to this CBOR item.

        The attached comment may be used by the prettify() method.

        Returns:
        The comment attached to this CBOR item.
        Since:
        1.5

      • setComment

        public void setComment(String comment)
        Attach a comment to this CBOR item.

        The attached comment may be used by the prettify() method.

        Parameters:
        comment - A comment to attach.
        Since:
        1.5

      • parse

        public abstract Object parse()
        Convert this CBORItem instance into an instance of a common Java class.
        Returns:
        An instance of a common Java class that represents this CBOR data item.

        Get the CBOR representation of this instance as a byte array. The implementation of this method calls encode(OutputStream).
        Returns:
        The CBOR representation of this instance as a byte array.

      • toString

        protected String toString(Number tagNumber)
        Get the string representation of this CBOR item. The default implementation of this method calls the toString() method.

        This method is called by the implementation of the CBORTaggedItem class.

        Parameters:
        tagNumber - The tag number prepended to this CBOR item.
        Returns:
        The string representation of this CBOR item.
        Since:
        1.8

      • prettify

        public String prettify()
        Stringify this CBOR item and all the nested CBOR items in the pretty format.
        Returns:
        The string expression of this CBOR item and all the nested CBOR items.
        Since:
        1.5

      • prettify

        protected String prettify(String indent,
                          String indentUnit,
                          Number tagNumber)
        Stringify this CBOR item and all the nested CBOR items in the pretty format.

        Subclasses should override this method as necessary.

        Parameters:
        indent - The indent inherited from the upper CBOR item.
        indentUnit - Additional indent that should be added when nested CBOR items are stringified.
        tagNumber - The tag number of the tag wrapping this CBOR item. If this CBOR item is not wrapped, null is passed.
        Returns:
        The string expression of this CBOR item and all the nested CBOR items.
        Since:
        1.7

      • encodeMajorWithNumber

        protected void encodeMajorWithNumber(OutputStream outputStream,
                                     int major,
                                     Number number)
                              throws IOException
        Write the CBOR representation of the specified major type and the number into the output stream. The value of the additional information is determined according to the actual value of the given number.

        The implementation of this method assumes the following.

        1. The given number is 0 or positive.
        2. The given number is an instance of Integer, Long or BigInteger.
        3. Even when the given number is an instance of BigInteger, its value does not exceed 18446744073709551615 (0xFFFF_FFFF_FFFF_FFFF).
        Parameters:
        outputStream - The output stream to write the CBOR representation into.
        major - The major type (from 0 to 7).
        number - The number to write.
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        RFC 8949, 3. Specification of the CBOR Encoding
